Reviews.Title: Looks like a Galaxy 4
Reviews.Author: Tiah N. Young
Reviews.Content: I love the phone, but I wasn't willing to downgrade to a 2g network, when I am on 4g.  However, my son, who also needed a phone, absolutely loves this phone.  I think it's because it looks like the Galaxy 4G.  So, we traded phones!  Problem solved.  It's slim with a nice big screen, easy touch and navigation.  It also has a built in case, that's attached to the back of the phone.  It folds over and covers the whole screen.  Pretty sleek!!

Reviews.Title: It's just okay!
Reviews.Author: sunny411
Reviews.Content: First I want to say that, Yes this is a smartphone, touchscreen, and android. However, it's also 2G! Which is not in the product description at all! Major downfall for this phone! Connecting to the browser is really slow when using your data plan. But if you are plan to use wi-fi from home, school, or work then maybe it's not so bad. But if you are person always on the go like me, this is not the phone for you. This phone is smart enough to give to a preteen, teenage, and some senior citizens. NOT FOR busy moms, dads, working professionals or students! Again, I only say this because of it's slow 2G. Also Microsoft office or 365 does not work on this phone. Also, you can use this phone on the att networks without any problems. I took mine to the att store, and a rep hooked it up for me. YOU will need the large SIM card for this phone. DO NOT PUT IN A SMALL SIM CARD! So as much as I liked the phone it is getting returned.Pro's:Sleeklight weightperforms wellgreat pictureCon's:2GCamera-just sucks really bad.On call speaker is not loud enough

Reviews.Title: good for side or back up phone
Reviews.Author: david bringer
Reviews.Content: good for side or back up phone has 2 gsm but etching network defiantly need wifi like i sais good for everything except network sucks no 4g

Reviews.Title: It works well
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: The phone works good but the reception is not perfect.  I would like better reception but for the price it works.

Reviews.Title: Lots of bugs!!!!
Reviews.Author: Judith A Black
Reviews.Content: My grandson bought this phone through my account and he is very careful of his phones.  It shocked him all the time and then wouldn't let him use any of his apps.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: smiley
Reviews.Content: works ok camera is no good. web works sometimes, get what u pay for feels light looks good  images are nice but camere no good

Reviews.Title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
Reviews.Author: Tonya
Reviews.Content: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!  Zero Stars!  This phone can't even handle receiving text messages!  Takes 15-20 minutes to get on facebook...IF it will load at all.  Tried to upload 3 pictures to facebook...took 15 hours...no joke!  Can't download pictures to phone.  Have to go outside to even talk on it.  This phone is useless.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy
Reviews.Author: Shari Myers
Reviews.Content: POS - will not charge to 100%. Everyone sounds mechanical. Texting is a nightmare. My family hated to call me on this phone. Waste of money!

Reviews.Title: It's an okay phone
Reviews.Author: Euniece Robinson
Reviews.Content: The applications shut down unexpectedly to much and the screen light flickers. I don't like the fact I can't take the swipe sound off the unlock screen.

Reviews.Title: Not all that Bad...They Tried
Reviews.Author: Niecy N.
Reviews.Content: I just got my phone. So far so good except...it's very slow, in a good coverage area it will pickup 3G. It keeps going to Google Hong Kong when I try to browse. I already know what not to expect from this phone. This phone says my wifi signal is poor, but my GS4 says its excellent at the same distance. Finally, battery #1 is not charging. I decided to turn the phone off to charge it. My indoor reception sucks, but outside the signal was strong. Its ok for what it cost even though I saw it for less, I just needed the phone service more than the data plan. My GS4 wifi does everything else I need.

Reviews.Title: It does not work
Reviews.Author: Issac Renee amaro
Reviews.Content: I did't like it  i did't think it wold be like this but I don't like it  I did not like it

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Freud
Reviews.Content: My sister wanted an S4 i bought her this and she loved it...if you have an annoying sister like mine or a daughter or maybe a wife who just want a sexy looking phone give them this

Reviews.Title: crappy phone
Reviews.Author: queonna
Reviews.Content: The phone was a piece of crap! It arrived to me with someone elses info still on it, no one could hear me when i was on a call, and it did have any of the features that it said in the description! I would not buy this phone!!

Reviews.Title: Very good phone.
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: This is my first smartphone, so I relied heavily on reviews when choosing which one to buy. Very good phone.
